12 
13  rospy.init_node("fake_odom_node")
14  pubOdom = rospy.Publisher("/test/odom", Odometry, queue_size=1)
15 
16  odomMsg = Odometry()
17  rate = rospy.Rate(15)
18 
19  # Just publishing the origin for now
20  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
21  odomMsg.header.seq+=1
22  odomMsg.header.stamp = rospy.get_rostime()
23  odomMsg.header.frame_id = "test/odom" #frame of pose
24  odomMsg.child_frame_id = "test/base" #frame of twist
25 
26  #odomMsg.pose.pose.position.x = 2
27  #odomMsg.pose.pose.position.y = -94.39635

29  odomMsg.pose.pose.position.y = self.y
30 
31  pubOdom.publish(odomMsg)
32  rate.sleep()
